A tendency of hiding from conflict means you can't initiate war unless there are Militarists within the Leading Political Parties.
Mutually assured promises of "easy money" and "free science" actually come true, resulting in everyone literally just getting free money.
All Trade Agreements have free Upkeep, Proposal, and Cancellation costs.
With a more stable senate, you are able to represent more parties
Add 1 slot to political party representation on Senate (Maximum 3) Doesn't affect dictatorships
Your senators are actually doing their job for once, and this allows you to squeeze in more legislation before they all go on holiday.
Eww yucky we hate the cold.
I don't like sand. It's course, and rough, and irritating. And it gets everywhere.
Oh jeez oh man, could you imagine living on a rock? That sounds scary.

This society has spent much of its time making sure the bureaucratic process runs as smoothly as possible, allowing this Empire to manage more colonies before running into problems.

This empire's people never cared about the finer details and paperwork, always thinking someone else would handle it. As a result, it cant manage as many colonies as others before things grind to a halt.
